Item: No rhetorical questions as page openers
Example: Bad: "Ready to transform your business?" Good: "Acme automates invoice processing for mid-market SaaS companies."

Item: No vague promises in opening copy
Example: Bad: "Unlock your potential" Good: "Reduce churn by 23% with automated health scoring"

FAQ section on every key page in Q&A format
